name: bngr-search
title: bngr Search
description: Use bngr to use bangs with your search engine of choice
author: raphaelluethy

preferences.name: customSearchUrl
preferences.title: Custom Search URL
preferences.description: Override the default search URL (e.g., https://bngr.ch?e=g)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
